FuncDef:
The link-protocol tdm command configures TDM as a serial interface's link layer protocol.
The undo link-protocol tdm command restores the default configuration.
By default, no TDM link layer protocol is encapsulated on a serial interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The link-protocol command allows you to configure the link layer protocol of a serial interface. Interface-related parameters must be configured in the interface view. Protocol-related parameters can be configured only after the correct link layer protocol is configured.
Prerequisites
The physical parameters for the interface have been configured and the physical layer status of the interface is Up.
Configuration Impact
Services carried by frames encapsulated with other protocols will be interrupted, and resources occupied by the services are released.
